Class MedicineRequest

java.lang.Object
entity.EntityObject
entity.request.Request
entity.request.MedicineRequest
public class MedicineRequest extends Request
Represents a request for a specific medicine, including details like the medicine ID, requested quantity, requestor and approver information, and timestamps for creation and modification.

  • Nested Class Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • MedicineRequest

      public MedicineRequest()
      Default constructor for the MedicineRequest class.

    • MedicineRequest

      public MedicineRequest(String id, String requestorId, String approverId, Request.STATUS status, LocalDateTime timeCreated, LocalDateTime timeModified, String medicineId, int quantity)
      Constructor to create a new MedicineRequest with specified details.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique ID of the request.
      requestorId - The ID of the person requesting the medicine.
      approverId - The ID of the person approving the request.
      status - The status of the request (e.g., PENDING, APPROVED).
      timeCreated - The timestamp when the request was created.
      timeModified - The timestamp when the request was last modified.
      medicineId - The ID of the medicine being requested.
      quantity - The quantity of the medicine requested.
